definition: to blend two or more medicines/compatibility (of herbal remedies, medicines)
to join/to fit/to mate/to mix/to match/to deserve/to make up (a prescription)/to allocate
squad of five soldiers/to associate with/five (banker's anti-fraud numeral)

sentences.english: The compatibilities of molybdenum dialkyldithiocarbamateand Cacompounds in greases were studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了氨基甲酸钼和钙化合物在润滑脂中的配伍性。

sentences.english: Quantitative analysis on different proportions of couple of Coptis and Scute.
sentences.chinese: 对黄连与黄芩的不同比例配伍进行定量研究。

sentences.english: The paper also provides guide scheme on coordinate sewing of smooth fabric.
sentences.chinese: 从而得出滑爽类服装面料缝制配伍的指导性方案。

sentences.english: Therefore, we Choose alcohol extraction of Scutellaria as compatible with Melittin.
sentences.chinese: 为此，选择黄芩醇提物作为与纯蜂毒肽配伍的中药。

sentences.english: The combination of aconite and dried ginger perfectly reflected the relativity of seven relations.
sentences.chinese: 附子与干姜的配伍，较好的反映了配伍七情的相对性。

sentences.english: The combination of aconite and dried ginger perfectly reflected the relativity of seven relations.
sentences.chinese: 附子与干姜的配伍，较好的反映了配伍七情的相对性。

sentences.english: Conclusion Cefpiramide sodium can be mixed with the five injections.
sentences.chinese: 结论头孢匹胺钠与五种常用输液可以配伍使用。

sentences.english: Aim To investigate the compatible stability of Astragalus mongholicus injection in TNA.
sentences.chinese: 目的考察黄芪注射液与全营养混合液配伍的稳定性。

sentences.english: Objective: To study the influence of Liuwei Dihuang Decoction against the thrombus.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究六味地黄汤及其配伍对血栓形成的影响。

sentences.english: The compatibility of ceftriaxone sodium with composite sodium chloride injection should be avoided in clinic.
sentences.chinese: 临床上头孢曲松钠与复方氯化钠不能配伍使用。

sentences.english: Objective To select effective anti-anxiety herb for clinical application.
sentences.chinese: 目的筛选抗焦虑中药材，为临床配伍应用提供依据。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To determine the compatibility of gatifloxacin for injection and metronidazole injection.
sentences.chinese: 目的考察注射用加替沙星和甲硝唑注射液配伍稳定性。

sentences.english: Conclusion The breviscapine injection and piracetam could be combined use directly without dispense abstinence.
sentences.chinese: 花素注射液与吡拉西坦注射液可以直接配伍使用。

sentences.english: Group A and B were given assigned dose-combination by intramuscular injection.
sentences.chinese: 和B组受试者按要求接受指定的配伍剂量注射。

sentences.english: Rich Zinc Noodle The Rich Zinc Noodle is made from high quality wheat …
sentences.chinese: 富锌面是用优质小麦粉和乳酸锌经科学配伍精制而成。

sentences.english: It is necessary to establish databases on compatibility of traditional chinese medicine and to establish standard pharmacological and toxicological research methods on "Shibafan".
sentences.chinese: 建立中药配伍数据库，规范“十八反”相关实验研究。

definition: medicine made from a single herb/drug made from a single substance
to relieve (cold, rheumatic pain etc)/lit. to dispel pathogenic wind (TCM)
Chinese thorowax (Bupleurum chinense)/root of Chinese thorowax (used in TCM)
to invigorate blood circulation and alleviate pain (idiom)
